thread.title: Body Found at Magic Castle: 5 Fast Facts You Need to Know
thread.title_full: Body Found at Magic Castle: 5 Fast Facts You Need to Know

author: Chris Bucher
title: Body Found at Magic Castle: 5 Fast Facts You Need to Know
text:
The Magic Castle — Magician's Body Discovered … Possible Suicide https://t.co/Ru6dc4XROZ 
— TMZ (@TMZ) February 25, 2017 

The Los Angeles Police Department is investigating a body found at the exclusive Magic Castle on February 24.
Here’s what you need to know about the situation:
1. The Death Is Suspected to be a Suicide TMZ reported that the body was found in a closet and the 
Lost another great artist and dear old friend to suicide tonight. Damn. Can't take this anymore.
— Eric Mead (@meaderic) February 25, 2017 

2. The Facility is a Private Club The Magic Castle is located in Hollywood and is a nightclub geared toward magicians and illusionists.
3. The Magic Castle Was Constructed in 1908 4. The Owners Were In a Legal Battle In 2015 5. The Man Was a ‘Well Known Magician’ This post will be updated. 
Chris Bucher is a sports, politics and general news contributor to Heavy. A University of Wisconsin-Oshkosh graduate, Bucher is the business editor at The Waukesha Freeman and the former sports assistant editor. You can follow him on Twitter @Buchage and reach him at chris.bucher@heavy.com. 
February 25, 2017 2:15 am
